name: Dashboard: Key metric cards visible
description: Verify one or more metric cards (Active Users, Checked In/Out) are visible to confirm dashboard content loaded.
descriptionHtml: Verify one or more metric cards (Active Users, Checked In/Out) are visible to confirm dashboard content loaded.

retries.statusDetails:
AssertionError: Key metrics cards should be visible on dashboard
assert (False or False or False or 0 > 0)
 +  where False = <bound method BasePage.is_element_visible of <pages.dashboard_page.DashboardPage object at 0x10bfaf570>>('text=Active Users, [class*="card"]:has-text("Active Users")', timeout=5000)
 +    where <bound method BasePage.is_element_visible of <pages.dashboard_page.DashboardPage object at 0x10bfaf570>> = <pages.dashboard_page.DashboardPage object at 0x10bfaf570>.is_element_visible
 +    and   'text=Active Users, [class*="card"]:has-text("Active Users")' = <pages.dashboard_page.DashboardPage object at 0x10bfaf570>.active_users_card
 +  and   False = <bound method BasePage.is_element_visible of <pages.dashboard_page.DashboardPage object at 0x10bfaf570>>('text=Users Checked-In, [class*="card"]:has-text("Users Checked-In")', timeout=5000)
 +    where <bound method BasePage.is_element_visible of <pages.dashboard_page.DashboardPage object at 0x10bfaf570>> = <pages.dashboard_page.DashboardPage object at 0x10bfaf570>.is_element_visible
 +    and   'text=Users Checked-In, [class*="card"]:has-text("Users Checked-In")' = <pages.dashboard_page.DashboardPage object at 0x10bfaf570>.users_checked_in_card
 +  and   False = <bound method BasePage.is_element_visible of <pages.dashboard_page.DashboardPage object at 0x10bfaf570>>('text=Users Checked-Out, [class*="card"]:has-text("Users Checked-Out")', timeout=5000)
 +    where <bound method BasePage.is_element_visible of <pages.dashboard_page.DashboardPage object at 0x10bfaf570>> = <pages.dashboard_page.DashboardPage object at 0x10bfaf570>.is_element_visible
 +    and   'text=Users Checked-Out, [class*="card"]:has-text("Users Checked-Out")' = <pages.dashboard_page.DashboardPage object at 0x10bfaf570>.users_checked_out_card
 +  and   0 = len([])
 +    where [] = <bound method Locator.all of <Locator frame=<Frame name= url='https://portal.trackzyng.codezyng.com/'> selector='[class*="card"], .metric-card, [data-testid*="metric"]'>>()
 +      where <bound method Locator.all of <Locator frame=<Frame name= url='https://portal.trackzyng.codezyng.com/'> selector='[class*="card"], .metric-card, [data-testid*="metric"]'>> = <Locator frame=<Frame name= url='https://portal.trackzyng.codezyng.com/'> selector='[class*="card"], .metric-card, [data-testid*="metric"]'>.all
 +        where <Locator frame=<Frame name= url='https://portal.trackzyng.codezyng.com/'> selector='[class*="card"], .metric-card, [data-testid*="metric"]'> = <bound method Page.locator of <Page url='https://portal.trackzyng.codezyng.com/'>>('[class*="card"], .metric-card, [data-testid*="metric"]')
 +          where <bound method Page.locator of <Page url='https://portal.trackzyng.codezyng.com/'>> = <Page url='https://portal.trackzyng.codezyng.com/'>.locator
 +            where <Page url='https://portal.trackzyng.codezyng.com/'> = <pages.dashboard_page.DashboardPage object at 0x10bfaf570>.page
 +          and   '[class*="card"], .metric-card, [data-testid*="metric"]' = <pages.dashboard_page.DashboardPage object at 0x10bfaf570>.metric_cards
